question: Ethan has one times as many Snapchat friends as Jessica. Jason has two times as many friends on Snapchat as Jessica. If Ethan has 61 friends on Snapchat, how many Snapchat friends does Jason have?
answer:
Jessica has 61/1 = <<61/1=61>>61 Snapchat friends.
Jason has 2*61 = <<2*61=122>>122 Snapchat friends.
#### 122
